channel.title: CVE Feed for AkshuDev -- PheonixAppAPI

item.title: CVE-2024-41951|2024-07-31T19:37:28.874Z -- akshudev -- pheonixappapi
item.description: Pheonix App is a Python application designed to streamline various tasks, from managing files to playing mini-games. The issue is that the map of encoding/decoding languages are visible in code. The Problem was patched in 0.2.4.
